name: Doctor on Demand, Inc.
description: Doctor on Demand, Inc. is a leading telehealth provider that connects patients with healthcare professionals through video consultations. Founded in 2013 by Dr. Phil McGraw and a team of health care innovators, the company aims to improve access to medical care by leveraging technology to reduce the barriers of traditional healthcare. With a focus on convenience and quality, Doctor on Demand offers a range of services including urgent care, behavioral health, preventive health, and chronic care management. Patients can consult board-certified physicians, psychologists, and psychiatrists from the comfort of their homes, making healthcare more accessible and efficient. The platform is designed to serve a wide array of individuals, including those with busy schedules or those living in remote areas. Doctor on Demand is committed to enhancing patient experience and outcomes by providing timely and effective care. As telehealth continues to grow in importance, especially in the wake of the COVID-19 pandemic, Doctor on Demand remains at the forefront of digital health solutions, striving to make healthcare more equitable and user-friendly.

seo.meta_title: Doctor on Demand, Inc. | Telehealth Services for Your Healthcare Needs
seo.meta_description: Explore Doctor on Demand, Inc., a leading telehealth provider that connects patients with healthcare professionals via video consultations. Improve your access to quality healthcare today.

faq.question: What services does Doctor on Demand provide?
faq.answer: Doctor on Demand provides urgent care, behavioral health, preventive health, and chronic care management services.

faq.question: How do I access Doctor on Demand?
faq.answer: You can access Doctor on Demand through their website or mobile app to schedule video consultations.

faq.question: Is Doctor on Demand available nationwide?
faq.answer: Yes, Doctor on Demand is available across the United States.

faq.question: Who can use Doctor on Demand?
faq.answer: Doctor on Demand is available to individuals seeking medical advice, regardless of location.

faq.question: When was Doctor on Demand founded?
faq.answer: Doctor on Demand was founded in 2013.
